title: 30. From Bloat + Breakouts to Bliss With Holistic Nutritionist Jass Stupak: How Coffee, Food, Probiotics, Candida + Gut Health Affect the Skin.
description:
Hi Roomies,

In this episode, I'm chatting with Jass Stupak, a Certified Holistic Nutritionist (CNP) who specializes in bloat & anti-fungal cleansing. 


In this episode we talk:

- How gut health affects the skin and overall health

- The best coffee we should be consuming to minimize gut issues

- What are parasites + candida? and what symptoms they can cause?

- Are probiotics worth it?

- Simple steps for better gut health

- Jass' story with perioral dermatitis and how she overcame it
